title: Kidodo Space KIDS INDOOR PLAYGROUND@Suntec
blurb: Cosmic attractions for kids aged 9 months to 12 years.
description: Kidodo Space KIDS INDOOR PLAYGROUND@Suntec offers a range of cosmic attractions suitable for kids aged 9 months to 12 years. Join us for an intergalactic adventure filled with fun and excitement! Kidodo Space provides a safe and stimulating environment where children can explore, learn, and play. Our facilities include interactive play areas, climbing structures, and sensory experiences designed to engage young minds and promote physical activity. We cater to families looking for a fun and educational outing.
datetime_display: Suntec offers a range of cosmic attractions suitable for kids aged 9 months to 12 years

title: Galaxy of Play at Kidodo Space Suntec City
blurb: Space-themed indoor playground in Suntec City.
description: Kidodo Space in Suntec City is a space-themed indoor playground where every child is a star! It features attractions like a 5-meter spiral slide, interactive ball-spraying machines, and a mini supermarket for pretend play. It aims to create unforgettable memories for kids and stress-free fun for parents. The playground offers a haven for young adventurers with various engaging activities suitable for families with young children. Parents can relax while kids explore and play in a safe and stimulating environment. The space is designed to encourage creativity, imagination, and social interaction among children.
datetime_display: Suntec At Kidodo Space, we believe every child is a star! Located in the heart of Suntec City, our space-themed indoor playground is a haven for young adventurers

title: Kidodo Indoor Playground Party & School Packages
blurb: Party & School Packages at Kidodo Indoor Playground
description: Kidodo indoor playground offers party packages for birthdays and school field trips. Weekday party package: $488 for 13 kids + 13 adults, 3 hours. Weekend party package: $688 for 13 kids + 13 adults, 3 hours. School field trip: $15/kid, minimum 10 kids, 2 hours. Non-refundable deposits required. Book now for a fun-filled experience at Kidodo! Kidodo is the perfect place for kids to have fun and learn. Our playground is designed to be safe and stimulating, and our staff is dedicated to providing a positive and memorable experience for all. We offer a variety of activities and programs to suit all ages and interests.

title: Kidodo Indoor Playground and Party Venue
blurb: Indoor playground and party venue for kids.
description: Kidodo is an indoor playground and party venue that offers a variety of activities for kids. They offer party packages for birthdays and other special occasions, as well as school field trips. The venue includes play areas and amenities suitable for children of various ages. Kidodo provides a safe and fun environment for kids to play and explore, with options for both structured events and free play. It's designed to cater to families looking for a place to celebrate or simply enjoy a day out with their children. Kidodo is a great place for kids to have fun and make memories.

title: Kiztopia Marina Square Venue Information Details
blurb: Explore party packages and school field trip options.
description: Kiztopia Marina Square offers various party packages for kids and adults, requiring a non-refundable deposit. They also provide school field trip options with complimentary access for teachers, subject to a minimum number of kids and a non-refundable deposit. The venue provides a fun and engaging environment for children's parties and educational school trips, ensuring a memorable experience for all attendees with a range of activities and amenities designed to cater to different age groups and interests, making it an ideal destination for families and schools looking for a unique and exciting outing.
